",["$r","p",null,{"children":["镜像站只会保留一段时间的 nightly，如果在安装时出现错误，请用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"RUSTUP_DIST_SERVER= rustup ..."}]," 来使用官方源。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"使用 rustup 安装 rust 时，若要启用镜像源，执行："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"# for bash

RUSTUP_DIST_SERVER={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}} rustup install nightly # for nightly

env RUSTUP_DIST_SERVER={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}} rustup install nightly # for nightly

env RUSTUP_DIST_SERVER={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}} rustup install nightly-YYYY-mm-dd","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"若要长期启用镜像源，执行："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"# for bash

# for fish
